name: Bear.io
description:
So many cute bears on the board!
Bear.io is a wonderful game with the most exquisite visuals and figure design.
The rule of Bear.io game is very easy. Your cute bear is walking here and there, what you should do is to drag your bear towards correct direction to knock your enemy bears into the river. When two bears knock with each other, they will rebound at the same time. Watch out not to fall into the water and try your best to hit the other into the water! Knock down as many opponents as you can and you will become bigger and bigger, stronger and stronger!

Features:
Free to play
Simple to control
Hard to master
Greatly addictive
Exquisite & Beautiful visuals
Various maps with different backgrounds
Excellent play on mobile device

You must be the last on the map to win! Are you the king bear? Come on!
